At Synopsys, were at the heart of the innovations that change the way we work and play Selfdriving cars Artificial Intelligence The cloud 5G The Internet of Things These breakthroughs are ushering in the Era of Smart Everything And were powering it all with the worlds most advanced technologies for chip design and software security If you share our passion for innovation, we want to meet youSynopsys Photonics Solutions is a leading developer of optical design and analysis tools, enabling photonic chip designers to automatically synthesize photonic designs, driven by fabrication information and required optical specificationsYou will be working in the RD team for our Photonic Solutions Business Unit with the Photonic Solutions PIC Design Suite and OptoCompiler software Our tools enable photonic chip designers to automatically synthesize photonics designs, driven by fabrication information and required optical specifications Together with other solutions within Synopsys a complete Photonic Integrated Circuit PIC Design Suite is being developed for the emerging technology of integrated photonics and Photonic Integrated Circuits PICs Synopsys PIC Design Suite is todays worldwide most widely used tool for PIC design and is used by designers in a variety of technologies, like silicon photonics, InP and silicon nitride

onze opdrachtgevers in de retail, industrie en utiliteitsmarkt op de kerngebieden elektrotechniek, werktuigbouw, beveiliging, IT, zwembadtechniek, industrile automatisering, robotisering en retailtechniek We zijn trots op het feit dat we al ruim 40 jaar innovatieve en duurzame oplossingen combineren met een uitstekende dienstverlening naar onze klantenFunctionJouw uitdaging als Meet en RegeltechnicusIn deze veelzijdige functie richt jij je op de besturing van gentegreerde systemen binnen onze utiliteitsprojecten Denk hierbij bijvoorbeeld aan projecten als zwembaden, sporthallen, kantoorgebouwen, scholen, fabrieken, laboratoria, cleanrooms en zorginstellingen Als Meet en Regeltechnicus ben je geheel verantwoordelijk voor de besturing van onder andere klimaatinstallaties, die we veelal met Priva systemen besturen Je vindt het leuk om na te denken over je eigen proces en deze constant te verbeteren Binnen Hollander Techniek houden we van samenwerken, dat doe jij ook veel met onze Engineers en Projectleiders van andere disciplines Omdat je als geen ander weet hoe belangrijk het is om met elkaar te overleggen, rekenen we op je goede communicatieve vaardighedenWe bieden je ook de ruimte om overige werk gerelateerde taken op te pakken die goed bij je passenBij dit alles dagen we je uit om na te denken hoe je je werk zodanig kunt inrichten dat je met minimale inspanning tot maximaal resultaat kunt komen Hierbij denken we aan het doen van optimalisatievoorstellen mbt ons proces, mogelijkheden om ICT te gebruiken om dit proces te optimaliseren etc We zijn hierin zeer vooruitstrevend en zeggen niet snel nee tegen een goed idee Wij zijn er trots op dat wij door continu te verbeteren een zeer hoge kwaliteit kunnen leveren tegen lagere kosten dus minder inspanning dan enkele jaren geleden We willen je uitdagen om kennis te nemen van onze werkmethodes en vervolgens je steentje hieraan bij te dragen Wanneer heb je tijd voor een kopje koffieWat ga nog meer doenWe gaan altijd voor de beste oplossing, wat zijn jouw kwaliteitenVoor het goed uitoefenen van deze functie is het van belang dat je relevante werkervaring in een soortelijke functie hebt opgedaan Daarnaast kent Priva voor jou weinig geheimen omdat je hierin al software hebt ontwikkeld Je vindt het een uitdaging dat geen dag hetzelfde is en je bent hierdoor gewend geraakt om snel tussen verschillende situaties te schakelen Daarnaast ben je vooruitstrevend, je denkt met ons mee om processen te verbeteren en Je denkt met ons mee om processen te verbeteren en vindt het leuk om je kennis te delenOfferWat bieden we je als Meet en RegeltechnicusAllereerst een zeer collegiale en gedreven werkomgeving met veel ruimte voor opleiding, persoonlijke ontwikkeling en groei We zijn financieel kerngezond en dat maakt dat we gericht blijven investeren in een betere toekomst We bieden je bij aanvang een marktconform salaris, afhankelijk van je kennis en ervaring Naast de mogelijkheid op een vast dienstverband bieden wij je uitstekende arbeidsvoorwaardenInformationWil je kennis maken of wil je meer weten, je bent van harte welkomVoor solliciteren kun je contact opnemen DescriptionProxyclick is a rapidly growing tech company based in the heart of Europe Our mission is to help businesses better manage their visitors well beyond the simple act of registration We incorporate into the visitor experience notions of security, health and safety, brand promotion and communication, and privacyOur cloudbased SaaS visitor management solution caters to the enterprise security needs of companies such as Airbnb, Audi, Dimension Data, LOral, or Pepsico Millions of people around the world use our appsIn everything we do, we strive to build the best possible product Our goal is to combine simplicity and power to deliver an awesome experienceWere looking for an experienced C Developer to join our EU team in our project office in RotterdamRoles and responsibilitiesYour priority will be to implement secure, reliable, and scalable solutions along with a number of exciting initiativesFinally, because your work is not only about writing code, you will be collaborating with our customer success team to solve complex issues and fix bugsWe dont need you to be familiar with all of these technologies to start working with us Great people learn what we use quickly and introduce us to new technologies tooAt Proxyclick we aim to foster a workplace free from discrimination We believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and backgrounds leads to a better environment for our people and a better product for our users We welcome everyone to our workplace, no matter where you are from, and the more diverse we are, the more unified our ability to ensure respectful connections all around the world

Job Description: Job TitleSimulation Software EngineerJob DescriptionThe Systems Simulation Department specializes in the analysis of system performance and system behavior by means of simulation models and operational data The engineers within the department use the results of these analyses to verify that performance requirements are met and to suggest improvements to system designs This support is provided to all the market segments Airports, Warehousing and Parcel, for all phases of the life cycle of a system, from RD and sales, to project execution and life cycle servicesAs a senior simulation software engineer you are responsible for designing, programming, testing and maintaining simulation and emulation software and models The, often complex, functionality of the software includes business logic, controls for mechanical transportation, sortation and storage equipment, communication with external computer systems, logging, reporting and data analysisAs a software engineer in our team, you are responsible for all aspects of software engineering You talk to colleagues to find out what to build You also design, discuss, and implement the solution in the form of a simulation or emulation modelThe software you write in these models is highly complicated, it has to simulateemulate all the relevant parts of the real system, while still maintaining performance We want to be able to run our model on a standard laptop, which makes performance a challenge This means your job isnt just to write working, readable code, but also to write performant code The main challenge in your daytoday job is finding the correct abstraction How can we leave out as much as possible without sacrificing the relevant details and still allowing users and developers to comprehend the logistic process and system behaviorAll in all, were looking for someone with an affinity for technology whos also a competent programmer, with experience in Object Oriented Programming, preferably Java, or otherwise C or CIf the role of Simulation Software Engineer appeals to you, then please apply now by completing the application form, and uploading your CV and cover letter For more information, please contact Annelieke van der Poel Recruiter on 31413494599 or AnneliekevanderPoelvanderlandecom

GitHub is changing the way the world builds software, and we want you to help build GitHub Were looking for an experienced fullstack software engineer to join a passionate, adaptive, and distributed group of engineers working to improve tooling and fundamentals in support of the main GitHub application The main focus of this role is to help developers building GitHub to do their best work This will involve leading the charge on hard problems and paving the paths for others to follow when they have similar things to solve Youll work with our team of engineers, designers, and product managers to build and maintain customerfacing experiences and deliver them into the hands of millions of developers across the world Responsibilities You will write, review and maintain code primarily in Ruby and JavaScript React and be willing to work with other languages if needed You will write architecture briefs and proposals, carry out code experiments, and work with Product and Design teams to build new features and own delivery endtoend You will need to work with engineering and product leadership to define and prioritize projects that help us meet business objectives You will need to be comfortable doing outreach across the engineering organization to understand needs and then to design and build things that address those needs You will document the systems you help build You will work with support to triage and debug technical support requests You will provide mentorship, pairing opportunities, and code reviews to encourage the growth of others You will become an owner and advocate for the health and quality of the systems that the team builds, participate in an oncall rotation and respond to incidents as necessary Minimum Qualifications At least 3 years experience developing web applications in Ruby on Rails At least 1 year of remote work experience on a software team Experience with Git and GitHub Experience with JavaScript and frontend client libraries like React Experience with SQL and general database knowledge A background in refactoring largescale systems Solid knowledge of testing principles Strong communication skills both written and verbal particularly as part of a remote team Preferred Qualifications Experience with telemetry systems eg Datadog, Sentry, VividCortex, Splunk Experience with eventdriven architectures and streaming data platforms eg Kafka Experience with orchestration eg Docker, Kubernetes Experience integrating with various third party services eg SendGrid, Slack, Firebase Who We Are GitHub is the developer company We make it easier for developers to be developers to work together, to solve challenging problems, and to create the worlds most important technologies We foster a collaborative community that can come togetheras individuals and in teamsto create the future of software and make a difference in the world Leadership Principles Customer Obsessed

At Databricks, we are obsessed with enabling data teams to solve the worlds toughest problems, from security threat detection to cancer drug development We do this by building and running the worlds best data and AI infrastructure platform, so our customers can focus on the high value challenges that are central to their own missionsFounded in 2013 by the original creators of Apache Spark, Databricks has grown from a tiny corner office in Berkeley, California to a global organization with over 1000 employees Thousands of organizations, from small to Fortune 100, trust Databricks with their missioncritical workloads, making us one of the fastest growing SaaS companies in the worldOur engineering teams build highly technical products that fulfill real, important needs in the world We constantly push the boundaries of data and AI technology, while simultaneously operating with the resilience, security and scale that is critical to making customers successful on our platformWe develop and operate one of the largest scale software platforms The fleet consists of millions of virtual machines, generating terabytes of logs and processing exabytes of data per day At our scale, we regularly observe cloud hardware, network, and operating system faults, and our software must gracefully shield our customers from any of the aboveAs a software engineer with a backend focus, you will work closely with your team and product management to prioritize, design, implement, test, and operate microservices for the Databricks platform and product This implies, among others, writing software in ScalaJava, building data pipelines Apache Spark, Apache Kafka, integrating with thirdparty applications, and interacting with cloud APIs AWS, Azure, CloudFormation, Terraform Make it simple to put data engineering and machine learning workloads into production on Databricks When customers crunch through petabytes of data, they do it with Databricks Jobs With exponential growth of the service and the missioncritical requirements to support production workloads, the distributed architecture is expected to scale to 10x the current usage while making the service 10x more reliable We are working on hard technical problems that span the full stack, including distributed systems, atscale service architecture and monitoring, workflow DAG optimizations, distributed computation, schedulers and UI Deliver reliable and high performance services and client libraries for storing and accessing humongous amount of data on cloud storage backends, eg, AWS S3, Azure Blob Store Build reliable, scalable services, eg Scala, Kubernetes, and data pipelines, eg Spark, Databricks, to power the pricing infrastructure that serves millions of clusterhours per day and develop product features that empower customers to easily view and control platform usage

Job Description: VideoIn this role you will be joining our Video team Conditional access remains key to what we do from managing new technology implementations, combating online piracy, offering anticheat methods for gaming to supporting customers demand for highquality multiscreen experiences Irdeto deliver to a global customer baseAs a Software Engineer you will be involved in the complete software development cycle component level design including creationreviewmaintaining, coding, unit testing as a part of the Irdeto Keys and Credentials team that creates innovative security solutions that protect critical infrastructure and devices of our customers You will be exposed to deployments in the cloud, cryptography, PKI, secure protocols and will learn how to securely communicate with embedded devices and about the modern Digital Rights Management technologies in the media industry Being part of our Agile team means you will be involved in estimation and planning and work collaboratively with the team  colleagues from other functional areas Any reported issues from the field will also require your expertise to solve and as we advocate clean code, you will be refactoring and looking to continuously improve the codeThis is a great opportunity to combine and learn both, security cryptography, PKI etc and cloud technologies You will be a part of a dynamic, international team responsible of securing millions of devices and will together decide which tools and methodologies will be used to get to the best resultBeing 100 quality driven, you will tackle large scale challenges, drive service performance and reliability, and design complex software systems that directly impact many of the largest TV operators and film studios worldwideSoftware EngineerMillions of devices secured with Irdeto managed keys protect the delivery of our customers media content ie latest UHD blockbuster movies, live sports and TV series You will be part of a team designing and implementing features supporting the generation and provisioning of PKI certificates and keys We are also innovating and expanding into other markets beyond media such as IoT, automotive V2X, WiFi endpoints, etcYoull work in a dynamic, multinational, collaborative and selfmanaged Agile team consisting of Software Engineers and Software Engineers in TestThe technologies you will be exposed to Python, ReactRedux, Jenkins, Unix, Git, AWSKnowledge and skills we hope you would bringWhy join IrdetoWe are on a mission to build a secure future, where people can embrace connectivity without fear Our lives are increasingly connected At Irdeto, we enable people and companies to experience connectivity effortlessly by protecting them from cyber attacks Security is the enabler of the connected world we live in Our solutions and services ensure that you can enjoy the latest video games, the best blockbuster movies and your favorite live events And it does not stop there our technology also secures connected transport and IoT connected industries  just to name a few With 50 years of expertise in security, we protect over 5 billion devices and applications for some of the worlds bestknown brandsWhat do we offer youAt Irdeto, we know that it is the people who make our company a successWith 50 successful years of business innovation behind us, Irdeto is a solid company to join We are looking for people who are energetic, dynamic and driven to be part of our communityWelcome to Irdeto

Job Description: It takes the brightest minds to be a technology leader It takes imagination to create green energy for the generations to come At Siemens Gamesa we make real what matters, join our global teamIn our offshore primary structures team we are looking for a Software Development Engineer For all our offshore wind farm projects, the team is responsible for performing project specific wind turbine load calculations and support structure design, focusing on the primary load carrying structure An internal software development project team is responsible for development and maintenance of the engineering tools Important aspects of the tool development are engineering process automation eg structural load calculations and user experience for the structural engineers The software development project team works in a DevOps manner to improve quality and feature delivery The project team is located in The Hague NLSiemens Gamesa Renewable Energy SGRE is the world market leader in offshore wind power With our innovations we aim to make the difference for wind power projects throughout the world SGRE supplies wind turbines and is an outstanding supplier of reliable, environmentally friendly and affordable renewable energy systems With our 25,000 employees in 90 countries worldwide, we supply clean and renewable energy with a total capacity of 85 GW, of which 50 GW under service SGREs endtoend value chain presence encompasses onshore and offshore wind turbine design, manufacturing, installation as well as cuttingedge service solutions Offshore projects in the Netherlands include Gemini, Westermeerwind, Borssele 12, Frysln and Hollandse Kust ZuidFor more information about our dynamic and rapidly expanding work environment check out the videos in the Siemens Gamesa section on YouTubeInterested to help our cuttingedge engineering team to make the world change to renewable energy Want to take us to the next level Dont waste time  apply now If you have any questions please feel free to contact our Corporate Recruiter, Marjolein Velthuijzen at 31613790644

Job Description: How do you make our customers happyBolcom is changing retail to make the daily lives of 12 million customers easier We cannot and wouldnt want to go about that alone And we dont We team up with 35,000 commercial partners who enrich our retail tech platform with their unique products Partners who are in turn empowered by, among many other things, realtime insights into customer behavior that our large tech community facilitates How do customers and partners interact on and with our platform What are the pain points And how can we improve our service As Senior Software Engineer  Data, you find the answers to these questionsWe process roughly 40,000 messages per second Our streaming data environment grows by about 5TB per day Its a challenge for our tech teams just to keep up And measuring this wealth of data is only the first step Capitalizing on those measurements actionable insights are key is on another planeYour responsibilities as Software Engineer in DataAs Java Engineer, you will join one of our Scrum teams We believe in ownership, and you will have a mandate together with your team to develop features endtoend At bolcom, we are big on autonomy, and that makes us strong we expect you to make all technical choices along the way but also to assume ownership when things go awry You build it  you run it  you love it is our mantra, and we live it every dayAs an Engineer, you will join one of our teams within The Platform Space, keeping the fabric of our entire universe together We enable roughly 600 developers in other spaces to shine like stars Home to the hardcore techies, we deliver the selfservice solutions for Data And a platform that will never be finished, because bolcom has been reinventing retail since 1999 And we always will be If theres a better way to do something, were working on it Together with our customers, partners, and over 2,000 colleagues And hopefully together with you Nice to know our tech community shares an ambition to work hard and play hard in equal measure Our teams deploy their own code to the production environment And once back in the office you can socialize on our soccer field, in the games room and in the bar on Friday afternoons Gezellig

Job Title: Software Developer  Remote Collaborative Tool (Code With Me)
Job Description: Are you a fan of IntelliJbased IDEs How would you like to create a cool new feature for them Join our team and help us to develop Code With MeCode With Me is a groundbreaking new feature that enables remote collaboration in all IntelliJ IDEs It lets you join remote projects running on other computers in a matter of seconds, meaning you can easily connect to colleagues, friends, a remote classroom, or even your own computer at home or in the office You can work on remote projects exactly as if they were on your local machine, using all the features of your favorite IDE

At Samba TV, we are on a mission to fundamentally change television viewing for everyone We are doing this by leveraging our data to enable advertisers to engage and measure TV viewers across all their devices We have an amazing story with a unique perspective formed by innovative technologyWe recognize that the way people discover, watch, and engage with television has fundamentally changed We connect the dots, providing a full picture of audience trends and viewership habits, and help marketers leverage this information to its full potentialWe are looking for talented developers excited to work with cuttingedge fullstack web technologies As part of a small, tightknit team that highly values mentorship and career development, you will support businesscritical tasks such as running campaigns driving millions of dollars of ad spend and producing beautiful reports summarizing data from millions of households to provide critical insights to our customers From designing beautiful React components and associated Redux stores to working with complex backend data models and asynchronous job processing architectures and much in between, you will learn and leverage a fullstack toolkit to solve pressing product problems

Job DescriptionRegardless of whether BackEnd, FrontEnd, FullStack, DevOps, a large part of what makes being part of our development  engineering organisation at Utilus so rewarding is the challenge you will have The job starts hard, and will only get harder You will not be sitting around your first few weeks getting a feel for things Youll be straight to the task at hand, doing what you love to do If you enjoy a fast paced environment where you get the chance to shape the way our DevOps team operates, we promise you will not be disappointed If you believe in constant improvement, and want to work with a team that helps one another reach that goal, then please continue readingAs a Software Engineer you are sworn to delivering highquality, reliable and maintainable code Code reviews certainly dont trouble you  you welcome them with open arms You are at home working with customers, project managers, designers and the rest of your teammates, to ensure the rapid delivery of properly working software to those that will use it Your pragmatic and agile DevOps is part of your system, and you have very strong desire to become better at your craft, learn new ways of doing things, and to help those around youWe are looking to change the enterprise software development industry, and we are growing a team of smart, ambitious and pragmatic people to accomplish this We take endtoend responsibility of a software system from initiation, to design and development, through initial operations and the many changes that are subsequently needed to keep the system going, relevant and commercially viable Our mission is to strive for engineering excellence, to foster continuous improvement and help both our people and our customer succeed and reach their full potential, and to automate anything and everything that can be automatedWe work for Alist clients that need their services to be rock solid, including our own We are constantly pushing to make things go faster, cheaper and more effective  for everyones benefitIf you would like to apply for this position, please drop us an email with an uptodate CV We are also interested in you as a person, so in lieu of the standard motivation letter, please tell us about yourself This helps us have a nice conversation and get to know you a bit better

Allround software developer, EV Charging InfrastructureAre you smart and energetic enough to join the EVI team, showing an effective and passionate contribution to the team If thats that a YES, then lets sit down and have a talk to see where you can fit in the team and enjoy the fun of working in the rapidly emerging EV market Making sure ABB will stay the number one in the exploding EV charging marketABB is market leader in fast charging solutions which enable 1530 min charging time for electric cars, a gamechanging technology which allows mass adoption of clean transportation Next to charging systems, our webconnected fast charging solutions offer a wide range of connectivity features such as remote monitoring, remote management  assistance, payment system and smartgrid integrationIn the beginning of 2018 the application team was created inside the EV product group to become the innovative group of people who can act, feel and create like a startup inside a large corporate organization In 2019 we have doubled the team and this year we can grow again to be able to serve the need for innovation in this very rapidly evolving market which will change the world of transportation and energy management significantlyFor our application team in Delft or Eindhoven, we are looking for aAllround software developerTasksYour technical skills, some key words PLC, C, smart grid, Linux ubuntu, Industry automation 40, embedded software, modbus, edge computing, Python, networking, power management, OPCUA, docker, Grafana, charging protocols CCSCHAdeMOACVAS, robotics, object recognition and DevOpsYour soft skillsattitude you will be part of a multicultural and multidisciplinary innovation team focusing on the electrification of the world wide car fleet, which feels like a startup environment  So when you are a handson, flexible, good communicator and a quick learner you will definitely feel at home, in this highly motivated team of about fifteen professional engineers in a nice mix of boys and girlsThe application team or Ateam, will take responsibility from initial concept up to first field deployments including service and supporting the new product introduction in the ABB factoriesOnce a product is commercially successful and all basic procedures are there, our baby will be fully handed over into the capable hands of a Product group within ABB to make the step to mass production Then the application team will take a more consultancy role for this product and continues with newstartup innovationsYour contribution to the team is to act as an software developer, this means responsible for implementing, testing and first deployment field support The focus will be on realtime field level, but you will also develop on the Edge device to make sure both work together as one This is contributing to a solution that supports the energy management and optimization on the eMobility sector You will pick up your use stories autonomously, find and filling the details yourself before start the design and implementationThe team follows the DevOps methodology on all three development layers PLC, Edge and cloud developed The cloud development is fully integrated and supported by the global ABB ability team industry leaders in their fieldHow your day could look like, just a random pick of the task which could occurRequirement on skillsWe offer you a varied job in an international group that attaches great importance to the development of its staff, as well as to quality and safety In this position, we also offer you the opportunity to Our VisionTo help people with housing, anywhereOur Mission Building a safe, efficient and global rental marketplace for anyone looking for or renting out a placeWe Care We Perform We EvolveAs a Software Engineer within the Product Development department, you will work closely with talented designers, product owners, and other Frontend and Backend Engineers to bring a superb user experience to the tenants and hosts on HousingAnywhereYou will join the Bookings and Users team and will be responsible for building the most crucial part of the rental experience  the booking You will make sure that the future tenants can seamlessly move from signing up on the platform to renting their new home Our teams domains include user registration and profiles, rental application, chat, and bookings tracking We have lots of exciting features and experiments planned for the upcoming months and cannot wait for you to join and help us make them happenWe use React Our codebase has been almost entirely migrated to Typescript While historically we relied on Redux for state management, we are increasingly adopting React Hooks and React Context APIWe strongly focus on performance and optimization to improve the SEO rank of the productWe pay great attention to the way we test our code to ensure the quality of code, allow refactoring over time, and increase confidence that what we build is rightGlad you asked Our team of colleagues exists out of many races, religions, countries of origin, sexual orientations, genders and abilities We welcome everyoneOver the past couple of months the majority of our staff has worked from home, wherever that is, and we continue to do so over the next months When the dust settles we hope to welcome you at our office in the heart of Rotterdam, the most beautiful city of the NetherlandsThe team culture is very open and were all motivated by our vision to help people with housing, anywhere This is what drives us every day and we invite you to do the sameHousingAnywhere is the biggest global booking platform for midterm rental accommodation in the world Being a peertopeer marketplace, we create an experience that serves both sides of the rental accommodation market and creates a direct connection between tenants and landlords HousingAnywhere is active in 50 countries and 400 cities We are partners with 160 universities worldwide and currently target the international students and young professionals market We are expanding to other audiences as wellIn 2017, we were awarded 4th most innovative company in the Netherlands and the 1st most innovative company in Rotterdam by the Dutch Chamber of CommerceIn 2018, we have been honored by being the fastest growing propTech company in the Netherlands as part of the Technology Fast 50 ranking of DeloitteGet ready to make a real impact and hit the ground running with early responsibilities You have the opportunity to take full ownership of your work and dare to do things differently Here, all ideas matterWork with a crazy unconventional team Think 110 people from 30 different nationalities Its like being on a roundtheworld trip while youre in the officeBudget for Dutch or English classes to help you kick off your stay in the Netherlands, and help you immerse into the Dutch cultureWork in the heart of Rotterdam in an office with an amazing view If youre looking for a city that is always packed with new things to discover, amazing architecture, a strong international community, this is the perfect place for youWe dont care about what you wear Youre welcome to wear a 3piece tuxedo or even a dragon onesie, we wont judge you Maybe a littleBeers  Cheers Get to know your colleagues over drinks while we celebrate our achievements every FridayAre you coming from abroad No worries, weve got you covered

DescriptionEvery year, we change the lives of millions of students and leave the world a little better than we found it And you can helpWe are out to solve one of the most burning problems in the world today How do we effectively connect people from all around the world to the global education opportunities, in a way that is useful and relevant for them You can help us solve that problem by becoming our next Software Engineer If you are passionate about problemsolving and like to work in a crazy, kind and performancedriven team, then keep on readingOur challenge is to build, adapt, and create the biggest education search platform in the world, bringing absolute transparency and reliability to international higher education We are both student and universitycentered and encourage our stakeholders to be the main architects of our online platforms You can help us bring our platforms to the next levelThe technology behind Studyportals platforms is based on PHP7, Typescript and AWS Services Virtually, all of our systems have been developed inhouse and are in compliance with modern quality standards We work in a serviceoriented architecture, powered by our own RESTful API and AWS In parallel, we are scaling up our infrastructure, moving more towards AWS and Docker That is because we want to get the most benefits out of the large variety of infrastructure and services available This is where you come inAs an Engineer, you will play an important role in further developing our infrastructure using AWS and other services Your responsibilities range from working on the core of our systems all the way up to producing proofofconcept web applications The FrontEnd Developers and UX designers will help you to turn your work into true and performant online experiences But you are also not afraid to get your hands dirty to help your fellow Frontend colleagues when neededYou will work in a multidisciplinary, international Scrum Team, taking input from our visual designers, UX Designers and our stakeholders Your goal is to put out the best implementations possible We are currently focusing on becoming more datadriven, expanding our continuous deployment process and testdriven developmentAs a software engineer, you understand what it takes to build scalable web applications The mindset that you should bring to the team is that that your skillset should not be limited to writing good, readable code only thats great, but it wont be enough here You are ambitious to reach your goals and are able to work independently, as well as in a team Sounds good Great The following requirements are necessary to be successful in this position

About the teamLife at Scribd starts as a document, eBook or audiobook that gets uploaded to Scribd Our conversion pipeline transforms these uploads into internal formats that our platform uses to feed our users desire to read in their browser or mobile app This conversion pipeline orchestrates numerous tasks that gather additional data eg text retrieval OCR, language classification, category classification, Spam analysis and more Our performant and highavailable content serving layer then makes sure our vast library of 100 million documents and 1 million books gets delivered to our customers39 devices

We zijn op zoek naar teamleden die zelfstandig in staat zijn om oplossingen te vinden, lef hebben en buiten de gebaande paden durven te denken Je wordt lid van een multidisciplinair team, dus er wordt ook van je verwacht dat je zeer goed kunt samenwerken en oog hebt voor de mensen om je heen Met creatieve oplossingen lever jij een bijdrage aan de beste gameervaring voor onze miljoenen gebruikers wereldwijd Maar het allerbelangrijkst vinden wij dat jij kunt zeggen dat je een superleuke job hebt waarin jij je technische ei helemaal kwijt kunt, en dat je met trots kunt vertellen waar je aan werktFunctieomschrijvingMomenteel zijn we binnen Gamebasics aan het kijken naar de mogelijkheden om naast Online Soccer Manager ook andere nieuwe projecten te starten Dynasty Duels is hier een eerste resultaat van, maar we gaan voor meer We zoeken naar een ervaren Software Engineer Unity3D die het leuk vindt om vroeg in het project al bij te dragen Jouw verantwoordelijkheid ligt op het gebied van de architectuur en code van de applicatie, maar je krijgt zeker ook de ruimte om je eigen ideen mee te nemen in het projectGevraagd wordtGeboden wordtBedrijfsprofielWij zijn Gamebasics Ht team achter Online Soccer Manager OSM Als Mobile Developer werk je dagelijks aan het voetbalmanagementspel, waar meer dan 5 miljoen mensen plezier aan beleven Het doel is verbeteren en uitbreiden Je bent onderdeel van een Agile Team dat werkt aan onze mobile devices iOS en Android In je team zitten ervaren software engineers, een designer en een tester, die met een gedeelde passie werken om een zo goed mogelijke gameervaring te bieden aan onze users

Job Title: Software ontwikkelaar binnen de Food & Beverage industrie
Job Description: Herken jij jezelf hierinMinimaal 5 jaar werkervaring op het gebied van softwareontwikkelingKennis en ervaring van PHP, Laravel en JavascriptDan ben ik op zoek naar jouVoor onze partner uit de omgeving van Hoofddorp ben ik op zoek naar een Full Stack developer De organisatie is nu 5 jaar actief in de markt en zijn een Europese speler met hun platform dat ze ontwikkeld hebben Het platform fungeert als een prijsvergelijkingstool voor de Food  Beverage industrie Door inzage te krijgen in de prijsverschillen kunnen partners die het platform gebruiken inzage krijgen van prijsveranderingen in de markt en zo hun prijs en marktstrategie hierop baserenWat 5 jaar geleden begon met 3 man is nu momenteel een club van 12 professionals Het team bestaat uit onder andere uit een afdeling sales, development en support Het ontwikkelteam bestaat uit 6 man en bestaat uit allemaal full stack developers Hier heb je namelijk geen 100 back end of frontend, flexibiliteit is dus fijn Tuurlijk wordt er altijd rekening gehouden met iemand zijn of haar specialiteit, maar in de lijn is iedereen op beide vlakken inzetbaar De cultuur die heerst binnen de organisatie is zeer informeel Het is dan ook nog een relatief klein bedrijf, maar als je kijkt naar de impact is deze zeer groot bij de eindklanten Dit typeert ook deze organisatie, zo efficint mogelijk werken zodat ze zeer schaalbaar zijnAls Full Stack developer hou jij je voornamelijk met lopende projecten voor de verschillende klanten Zo bouw je de ene dag aan prijsschifting systemen en de andere dag onderzoek je crawlers en stel je ze zo in dat de data goed binnen komt binnen het systeem Daarnaast bouw je mee aan dashboards en ben je dus constant bezig met het verbeteren van het platform Er is een vaste werkwijze, zo werken ze met Trello kaarten en onderverdelen ze deze aan het begin van iedere week onder de developers Dit wordt door de lead developer gedaan, maar in samenspraak met het teamEr wordt erg veel geautomatiseerd en doorontwikkeld hier Mede door hun visie van schaalbaarheid is dit ook nodig Momenteel zijn ze plannen aan het maken om de Frontend om te gaan zetten naar Vuejs bijvoorbeeld Verder omdat het zon jong bedrijf is maak je direct impact Ontwikkelingen die nu doorgevoerd worden dragen bij aan de toekomst en visie van het bedrijf Die visie liegt er niet om uiteindelijk Europees marktleider worden binnen de Food  Beverage marktBen jij enthousiast geworden Solliciteer dan direct door jouw CV en motivatie te sturen naar email protected of bel mij op 0628193041

Your Tasks Will Include The FollowingWe are looking for a talented and enthusiastic software engineer to join our development team In this position you will be part of the product team, that works on our main web application You will mainly be working on our Python3 backend, which powers our API and serves as the main entry point for our services You will also be working on our API integrations, ads services, our export channels, new userfacing features, and our background jobs through which we process hundreds of millions of products per day You will also be closely working together with our Infrastructure and DevOps teams, which are working on many other services that power Channable under the hoodIf you want to read more about our development adventures, check out our tech blogYou can also take a look at some of our opensource work at to get a feeling of how we work together and what our code looks likeIts important to us that you fit well into our team Additionally, the following elements are requiredAnd then there are some things that are nice to haveInterested Please send us your CV and motivation letter Dont forget to include a link to your Github profile if you have one We will go through application and get back to you within one week If you piqued our curiosity, we will invite you to start the recruitment process, which consists of three steps First, we will ask you to work on an assignment to determine whether your Python skills match our expectations If we think your skills match what were looking for, you will be invited for an interview via Google Hangouts If this interview is positive from both sides, we will invite you for a second and last interview, also via Google Hangouts Your starting date is flexible, but preferably as soon as possible We are now mainly working from home, with the possibility to work from our office in Utrecht one or two days a week

Delivery Engineer Smart Water SoftwareIn this digital era there is a big hype for smarter water management with digital solutions andour company has a clear lead with Aquasuite To scale up internationally, we are looking for a Delivery Engineer to strengthen our teamAquasuite serves the entire human water chain from drinking water production and delivery to waste water collection and treatment The Aquasuite software solutions include data analytics, monitoring, prediction, decision making support and realtime holistic control in the water chain It is a proven platform with now more than one hundred connected water systems around the world Eight out of ten Dutch water companies, for example, use Aquasuite products to deliver water efficiently Our solutions are implemented on location edge computing and  or are delivered from the cloudWe are looking for an experienced professional The core task is to deliver digital solutions to customers The digital solution supervises the primary process of water supply and water treatment A solution that even drives the most important processes in the water cycle at a holistic levelYou are responsible in projects for design, configuration and testing up to commissioning and support You work closely with sales, product management, support and software development You enter the delivery team of delivery engineers and project managers We have considerable ambitions to scale up, so that offers great international opportunitiesAt least 5 years of relevant work experience in the delivery of industrial process automation, software solutions or control engineering PLC en SCADABSc in industrial automation, computer science, electrical engineering or similarThe idea ofIT security works to your advantage and the understanding of cloud computing is an advantageExperience within the water sector works to your advantageCustomeroriented  experience with stakeholder managementMentality of approaching and not stopping before quality is deliveredBecause we are scaling up internationally, you are available for short trips abroad  max 4 consecutive weeks at different locationsSpeaking Dutch and English in addition, knowledge of other languages is also an advantageYou will work within the Digital Water group We offer a good working atmosphere, within which collegiality and development of the organization and employees are the most important factors We coach you actively We reward based on performance and personal competences and the training opportunities are generous We combine this with an excellent package of flexible employment conditions In addition to the excellent employment conditions, we offer you the option to subscribe to a trade journal of your choice to stay informed of everything that is going on in your field

About UsMessageBird is transforming the communications landscape as one of the fastestgrowing software companies in the world Our cloud communications platform makes it possible for businesses to instantly connect with over 7 billion phones globally, allowing them to speak with their customers in the same ways they talk to their friendsOur suite provides access to all major messaging channels, from SMS and Voice to WeChat, Messenger, Facebook, WhatsApp and more We provide outofthebox solutions with our own applications like Inbox and Flow Builder, plus a robust set of APIs that simplify workflows and automationWith over 20,000 customers  including some of the worlds biggest brands like Facebook, Deliveroo, Uber and WhatsApp  its likely that youve benefited from MessageBirds omnichannel technology at some point For small and midsized businesses, we also offer support and solutions through an Online SelfServe OSS dashboardOur global team is a powerhouse of 350 employees, who work across eight international offices Were excited that youre here and interested to We work fast, grow fast, and build fast Life at MessageBird moves in fastforward motion Were a team that focuses on making an impact  right from day one We are gogetters, industry leaders, and dreamers Risk takers Rollupyoursleevesandmakeithappen kind of people We thrive on transparency, and we value solutionminded attitudesWe are all driven by one ethos Get Shit Done We love shaping things together and leveraging different perspectives, because that makes our products better Our Birds are empowered with freedom and opportunity in return, we expect honesty, courage, and agility We own our work, and sometimes we fail And then we get back up and cross the finish line  together as a team Sound refreshing We think so, tooSoftware Engineers play a big role in our RTC engineering squads Youll be responsible for designing, developing and maintaining services and components within the domain of our Voice Calling API and or SIP Trunking products These products enable our customers to place and receive millions of voice calls per day, gain realtime insights using our Dashboard and create new and innovative voice flowsOur voice squads have the freedom and authority to create impactful products to empower both our internal and external customers We use an agile development methodology, meaning we deploy code multiple times per day while ensuring our applications are rigorously tested and statically analyzedIf you think youre a match for this role and can bring some Job Title: Software Engineer National Sports Data Platform Sport Data Valley
Job Description: Sport Data Valley is ht nationale onderzoeks en analyse platform voor data rond sport en bewegenFunctieomschrijvingSport Data Valley SDV is een grootschalig project voor de ontwikkeling van een nationaal onderzoeks en analyse platform in de sport, die wordt ontwikkeld door onderzoeksinstellingen uit Delft, Leiden, Amsterdam en Twente, en wordt gefinancierd door ZonMw Het SDVplatform biedt toegang tot een grote verzameling sportspecifieke data, de mogelijkheid zelf sportdata toe te voegen en analyses uit te voeren op deze data Landelijk zijn er meerdere Sport Data Valley labs, waar genteresseerden handson met sportdata aan de slag kunnen De labs hebben een loketfunctie om de sport te ondersteunen en zijn direct gelinkt aan gevestigde en erkende sportnetwerken oa Thialf Heerenveen, Amsterdam, Tongelreep in Eindhoven, Sport Engineering Institute in Delft, en Science lab in Leiden Deze labs zijn een spil in een hecht nationaal sport ecosysteem van atleten, coaches, bedrijven, overheden en kennisinstellingen Tijdens je werk als software engineer zul je verschillende Sport Data Valley labs ondersteunen en dus op meerdere locaties werkzaam kunnen zijn waarbij de hoofdvestiging van SDV in Leiden zit, en de uitvalsbasis het Sport Engineering Instituut in Delft zal zijnBinnen Sport Data Valley werk je in een multidisciplinair team van data stewards en software engineers Samen met het team ben je het aanspreekpunt voor eindgebruikers die beweegdata willen verzamelen, opslaan, structureren en  of laten analyseren Daarnaast werk je nauw samen met het ontwikkelteam van het online platform Concreet betekent het dat je als software engineer technisch advies geeft over het ontwikkelen van nieuwe functionaliteiten binnen het online platform, en het opslaan en visualiseren van data en efficinte datastromen bij eindgebruikers Uiteraard help je ook mee aan de implementatie van de gekozen techniekenVoor de uitbreiding van ons team zoeken we een software engineer met ervaring in softwareontwikkeling en affiniteit met data engineering en sportAls software engineer ondersteun je eindgebruikers zoals coaches, onderzoeker, beleidsmedewerkers en bedrijven in het gebruik van het online Sport Data Valley platform en andere datagerelateerde vraagstukken Je helpt met de implementatie van technische functionaliteiten die de eindgebruiker helpen meer inzicht te krijgen in de verzamelde data Daarbij werk je op meerdere locaties in het land en werk je samen in een multidisciplinair team van enthousiaste data stewards en software engineers Ook heb je nauw contact met software engineers van onze ontwikkelpartner, en geef je samen met hen richting aan de ontwikkeling van het Sport Data Valley platform Je krijgt veel ruimte voor eigen inbreng, en geeft ondersteuning aan technische aanpassingen in het platform Je hebt veel contact met klanten en betrokken partners en hebt een actieve rol in de ontwikkeling van schaalbare tools, diensten en producten in samenwerking met onze projectpartnersDe functie heeft een omvang van minimaal 32 0,8 fte en maximaal 38 uur per week 1 fte, tm december 2021 In eerste instantie gaat het om een contract voor een jaar met de mogelijkheid om te verlengen Het salaris is afhankelijk van opleiding en ervaring gebaseerd op schaal 9 of 10 met een maximum van  4402, bruto per maand bij een volledige aanstelling Daarnaast biedt een aantrekkelijk pakket secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden, zoals een eigen laptop, flexibele werkweek, korting bij zorgverzekeraars, en de mogelijkheid om jaarlijks een individueel arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket samen te stellen, waarbij opleidingen enof cursussen naar keuze bespreekbaar zijn Op de campus is een Internationaal Kindcentrum met kinderopvang, voor en naschoolse opvang en een internationale basisschool Het salaris en de arbeidsvoorwaarden zijn gebaseerd op de CAO Nederlandse UniversiteitenDe Technische Universiteit Delft heeft een sterk fundament Als bouwer van de wereldberoemde Nederlandse waterwerken en pionier in biotech is een internationale topuniversiteit die wetenschap, engineering en design combineert staat voor onderwijs, onderzoek en innovatie van wereldklasse om uitdagingen op het gebied van energie, klimaat, mobiliteit, gezondheid en digitale maatschappij aan te gaan Generaties Delftse ingenieurs hebben bewezen ondernemende probleemoplossers te zijn in bedrijfsleven en in sociale context Bij omarmen we diversiteit en streven we ernaar zo inclusief mogelijk te zijn zie onze gedragscode Samen bedenken en ontwikkelen we oplossingen die een positieve invloed hebben op wereldwijde schaalChallenge Change ImpactDe faculteit 3mE verricht baanbrekend onderzoek dat leidt tot uitdagende toepassingen en nieuwe fundamentele inzichten op het gebied van werktuigbouwkunde Van grootschalige energieopslag, medische instrumenten, regeltechniek en robotica, tot slimme materialen, structuren op nanoschaal en autonoom varende schepen De basis en resultaten van dit onderzoek vinden hun weerslag in uitstekend en modern onderwijs dat studenten opleidt tot maatschappelijk betrokken en verantwoordelijke ingenieurs en onderzoekers De faculteit 3mE is een dynamische en innovatieve faculteit met een internationale scope en hightech labfaciliteiten Onderzoek en onderwijs richten zich op ontwerp, productie, toepassing en verbetering van producten, materialen, processen en mechanische apparaten en dragen zo bij aan de ontwikkeling en groei van een duurzame samenleving en aan welvaart en welzijnKlik hier om naar de website van faculteit Werktuigbouwkunde, Maritieme Techniek  Technische Materiaalwetenschappen te gaanVoor informatie over deze vacature kun je contact opnemen met Frans van der Helm  Sports Engineering Institute, 0152785616, FCTvanderHelmtudelftnl of Lotte Lintmeijer Sport Data Valley, tel nr 0616685206, lottesportdatavalleynlVoor informatie over de sollicitatieprocedure Nathalie van Benthem HR email application3metudelftnlBen jij onze nieuwe software engineer Stuur je motivatie en CV gericht aan Frans van der Helm naar sportsengineeringtudelftnl De sluitingsdatum is 2 decemberEen preemployment screening kan onderdeel uitmaken van de selectieprocedure

At Databricks, we are obsessed with enabling data teams to solve the worlds toughest problems, from security threat detection to cancer drug development We do this by building and running the worlds best data and AI infrastructure platform, so our customers can focus on the high value challenges that are central to their own missionsFounded in 2013 by the original creators of Apache Spark, Databricks has grown from a tiny corner office in Berkeley, California to a global organization with over 1000 employees Thousands of organizations, from small to Fortune 100, trust Databricks with their missioncritical workloads, making us one of the fastest growing SaaS companies in the worldOur engineering teams build highly technical products that fulfill real, important needs in the world We constantly push the boundaries of data and AI technology, while simultaneously operating with the resilience, security and scale that is critical to making customers successful on our platformWe develop and operate one of the largest scale software platforms The fleet consists of millions of virtual machines, generating terabytes of logs and processing exabytes of data per day At our scale, we regularly observe cloud hardware, network, and operating system faults, and our software must gracefully shield our customers from any of the aboveUnlike traditional enterprise software, we design and build modern SaaS products that bring delight to all of the stakeholders decision makers, admins, and end users As a full stack software engineer, you will work closely with your team and product management to bring that delight through great user experienceSQL Analytics is a new product that provides Databricks customers with a firstclass experience for performing Business Intelligence BI and running SQL workloads directly on the data lake Our team builds the console for SQL Analytics, where users configure, manage and monitor their SQL usageThis team powers all asynchronous customer workloads for Databricks which is the majority of Databricks usage As this usage has rapidly increased  weve rearchitected the system for increased stability and scalability We are also building exciting new features for more advanced workflows and customer observability This team has a mix of frontend, backend, and reliability engineering skills  projects

Job Title: Software Engineer in Data Science - Forecasting
Industry: ['Retail', 'Logistics and Supply Chain', 'Information Technology and Services']
Job Description: How do you make our customers happyAt bolcom we want our customers to always find the products they need in stock and to have their calls and emails replied to in a timely manner by our customer service The Data Scientists in Team Forecasting are heavily supporting this, providing and improving the forecast of the optimal amount of stock and customer service employees we need in a specific moment in the future The Engineers in the same team support these through conceptualizing and developing a stable, performant and scalable general purpose forecasting platform that allows data scientists to get from idea to production within one 1 day Weve come a long way but were not there yet , If you help us turn that dream into a reality, the Forecasting team can facilitate bolcom with even more meaningful, smart and reliable forecasts in real time A huge boost for customer satisfactionBolcom is transforming retail to simplify life for 115 million customers Were not going about that alone, but in collaboration with 35,000 partner sellers who enrich our retail tech platform with unique propositions But how do we match demand with supply This is where our forecasts come in These invaluable tools support datadriven decision making across the organization and enable us to finetune every aspect of our operations From personnel planning in the Customer Service domain to stock management in Logistics and Sourcing In all, we provide millions of forecasts every single day So how do we streamline that processYour responsibilities Software Engineer in Data Science  ForecastingYou will join a team of young, enthusiastic Data Scientists and Engineers of various nationalities, and with diverse backgrounds and humortolerance levels  We continuously explore new opportunities within the company, which leads to a dynamic roadmap and an environment where each team member claims ownership over their own decisions The Engineers are focused on the platform Delphi that strips away the extraneous and allows Data Scientists to focus on what they do best On a technical level, the platform is extremely adaptable to new forecasts and scales well to reasonably large data sets eg all sales, for a few years with multiple levels of granularity Moreover, Delphi can handle our future requirements, such as live forecasting and sandbox environments It encompasses job scheduling, ETL pipelines, archiving of historic forecasts and models, and provides a bulk interface for forecast output As Software Engineer in Data Science  Forecasting, it is up to you to further build, run and love this platformThe setting is unique because the team is a mix of Data Scientists and Engineers who work together daily to improve existing forecasts and cook up new ones The Data Scientists are constantly experimenting with the data and models in search of new perspectives to further improve forecasting accuracy Our Engineers provide the underlying platform to make these experiments not only possible but also easy and efficient That entails making sure everything runs smoothly on a production level, but it also calls for constant software and infrastructure innovations to ensure future stability As a Software Engineer you will work closely with the Data Scientists, so you need to understand their goals and struggles, and support them by improving and extending the platform Our stack currently includes Python, Kotlin, Airflow, Big Query and Cloud SQL But we are open to experiments with other technologies and tools that can benefit our platform, the team and, eventually, our forecasting prowess

Software architect and developer, EV Charging InfrastructureAre you smart and energetic enough to join the EVI team, showing an effective and passionate contribution to the team If thats that a YES, then lets sit down and have a talk to see where you can fit in the team and enjoy the fun of working in the rapidly emerging EV market Making sure ABB will stay the number one in the exploding EV charging marketABB is market leader in fast charging solutions which enable 1530 min charging time for electric cars, a gamechanging technology which allows mass adoption of clean transportation Next to charging systems, our webconnected fast charging solutions offer a wide range of connectivity features such as remote monitoring, remote management  assistance, payment system and smartgrid integrationIn the beginning of 2018 the application team was created inside the EV product group to become the innovative group of people who can act, feel and create like a startup inside a large corporate organization In 2019 we have doubled the team and this year we can grow again to be able to serve the need for innovation in this very rapidly evolving market which will change the world of transportation and energy management significantlyFor our application team in Delft or Eindhoven, we are looking for aSoftware architect  engineer, EV Charging InfrastructureTasksYour technical skills, some key words smart grid, software architecture, Linux ubuntu, Azure, IoT, Industry automation 40, edge computing, CICD, Python, cybersecurity, networking, power management, OPCUA, AI, docker, PLC highlevel, Grafana, charging protocols CCSCHAdeMOACVAS and DevOpsYour soft skillsattitude you will be part multicultural and multidisciplinary innovation team focusing on the electrification of the world wide car fleet, which feels like a startup environment So when you are a handson, flexible, good communicator and a quick learner you will definitely feel at home, in this highly motivated team of about fifteen professional engineers in a nice mix of boys and girlsThe application team or Ateam, takes responsibility from initial concept up to first field deployments including service and supporting the new product introduction into the ABB factoriesOnce a product is commercially successful and all basic procedures are there, our baby will be fully handed over in the capable hands of a Product group within ABB to make the step to mass production Then the application team will take a more consultancy role for this product and continues with newstartup innovationsYour contribution in the team is to act as an software architectdeveloper, so be responsible for the full architecture from cloud integration down to edge devices and plc realtime controlContributing to a solution that supports the energy management and optimization on the eMobility sector Taking the balance into account between the different internal stakeholders, new creative ideas, the business KPIs and convert this into a spot on release cycle plan together with the product owner and product managers Since we are a small team would definitely help that you enjoy to write code yourself, figure out some complex OS or network related challenges or execute a test yourself at a customer siteThe team follows the DevOps methodology on all three development layers PLC, Edge and cloud developed The cloud development is fully integrated and supported by the global ABB ability team industry leaders in their fieldHow your day could look like, just a random pick of the task which could occurRequirement on skillsWe offer you a varied job in an international group that attaches great importance to the development of its staff, as well as to quality and safety In this position, we also offer you the opportunity to specialize in ABB products and systems Of course, we offer you a competitive and attractive package of employment conditionsInterestedRegister your CV and apply online via wwwabbnl by clicking on Careers For questions regarding the open position please contact Jacqueline Pereboom, email sollnlabbcom, tel  31 0104078214Smart Power

Wie zijn wijWe zijn een informeel en gezellig bureau uit t Gooi Al ruim 10 jaar helpen wij onze klanten bij het bedenken en ontwikkelen van slimmere webapplicaties, maatwerk websites en slimme webshops We hebben een eigen CMS ontwikkeld waar we veel gebruik van maken en we werken voornamelijk in PHP, Laravel, Vuejs en GitOndanks dat we een internetbureau zijn en dus projecten aannemen, werken we dingen niet afgeraffeld af We hechten veel aan kwaliteit en vinden het dan ook belangrijk om de tijd te nemen Daarnaast hebben we ook veel vaste klanten, waar we doorlopend mee samen werken We doen aan peer reviewen n er wordt geen code opgeleverd, zonder dat er een extra paar ogen naar heeft gekekenWe doen regelmatig leuke dingen als team Dit zegt ieder bedrijf, maar wij doen cht leuke dingen Zo zijn we naar Laracon in New York gevlogen, hebben we bedrijfsuitjes in London en Ibiza gehad en houden we ook van de kleine dingen, zoals kerst en paasontbijt, BBQs en doen we regelmatig dingen terug voor de maatschappijOns team bestaat uit vier andere programmeurs PHP, twee vormgeversFrontenders en twee online marketeers Ons team is vrij gevarieerd we hebben sportieve fanatiekelingen, gezonde eters, gamers en golfers in ons middenMomenteel zijn wij bezig met het ontwikkelen van een nieuw CMS voor eigen gebruik Dit houdt in dat onze meest ervaren developers hier de aankomende tijd erg druk mee bezig zijn en daarom zijn wij hard op zoek naar extra collegas Naast ons nieuwe CMSsysteem hebben we ook verschillende zware applicaties die we moeten blijven door ontwikkelen voor klanten Als Backend developer ben jij verantwoordelijk voorJij bent een prettig teamlid en ziet het nut van peer reviewen Daarnaast heb jij ervaring met oa PHP, Laravel, TDD en CI Verder is het belangrijk dat jij beschikt overScoor extra puntenMocht je vragen hebben over de bovenstaande vacature of wil je hierover sparren, neem dan contact met mij op Stuur jouw CV en motivatie naar email protected

Job Title: Software Engineer A - fullstack Developer - Amsterdam Airport Schiphol
Job Description: Royal Schiphol GroupRoyal Schiphol Group brings the world within reach We connect the Netherlands with the rest of the world, creating value for the economy and society Achieving this involves over 2,000 employees working 24 hours a day, 7 days a week Our ambition is to develop Schiphol into Europes best hub Airport, both for passengers and for airlines Innovation is key to achieve this ambitionDepartment DigitalThe Digital department at Schiphol is organized into three Value Streams, based on the three Schiphol priorities Airport  Airline Performance, Customer Experience and Smart Assets  Buildings There is also a Data  Analytics team that provides the Value Streams with predictive data and the Innovation Hub that focuses on Horizon 2 and 3 innovation The various staffs, such as HR, finance and support, are represented across the departmentWhere do you end upYou end up in the Smart Assets  Buildings streamSmart Assets  Buildings focuses on the development of actionable insights and products and services with which Schiphols capacity assets and buildings can be utilized more sustainably and efficientlyYou end up in a team that is fully developing with ambitious goalsThe roleAs a fullstack developer youll be part of a Scrum team working on a new application for Asset Management to help guarantee operational continuity at SchipholYou will be responsible for writing code with a full stack mindset This would entail managing docker services, the build pipeline, writing restful APIs and reusable clientside codeTechnology stack Typescript Nodejs  Express Angular Rxjs  reactive programming Docker  OpenShift Kafka Jest  CypressWhat you can help us with Working on features in one of the feature teams Writing backend projections for Kafka Writing restful APIs Maintaining the infrastructure  build pipeline Be part of the backend guildWho are youThe right candidate has a proactive and Agile mindset He or she likes to work in a team and is well skilled If you have the following qualifications, we would love to see your application Experience with Angular Experience with NodeJS Experience with sourcing of stream processing Experience with LinuxDocker Experience with working in a cross functional scrum teamIts nice if you have experience with Functional programming RxJS KafkaWhat we ask 32 Hours per week from Monday to Thursday Start ASAP Contract length is 6 months minimal

Delivery Engineer Smart Water SoftwareIn this digital era there is a big hype for smarter water management with digital solutions andour company has a clear lead with Aquasuite To scale up internationally, we are looking for a Delivery Engineer to strengthen our teamAquasuite serves the entire human water chain from drinking water production and delivery to waste water collection and treatment The Aquasuite software solutions include data analytics, monitoring, prediction, decision making support and realtime holistic control in the water chain It is a proven platform with now more than one hundred connected water systems around the world Eight out of ten Dutch water companies, for example, use Aquasuite products to deliver water efficiently Our solutions are implemented on location edge computing and  or are delivered from the cloudWe are looking for an experienced professional The core task is to deliver digital solutions to customers The digital solution supervises the primary process of water supply and water treatment A solution that even drives the most important processes in the water cycle at a holistic levelYou are responsible in projects for design, configuration and testing up to commissioning and support You work closely with sales, product management, support and software development You enter the delivery team of delivery engineers and project managers We have considerable ambitions to scale up, so that offers great international opportunitiesYou will work within the Digital Water group We offer a good working atmosphere, within which collegiality and development of the organization and employees are the most important factors We coach you actively We reward based on performance and personal competences and the training opportunities are generous We combine this with an excellent package of flexible employment conditionsIn addition to the excellent employment conditions, we offer you the option to subscribe to a trade journal of your choice to stay informed of everything that is going on in your field

app fast and responsive You will be a part of our development team and work closely together with the other team members We value the readability, maintainability and testability of our codebase and look for someone who shares these values If you would like to get a feeling of how we work together and what our code looks like you can take a look at some of our opensource work at  You can also take a look at our tech blog at  Our Stack includes Haskell, Python, PostgreSQL, Redis, Ansible, Terraform, Emberjs, Prometheus And we run all of our infrastructure on Google Cloud PlatformDesign, development, and testing of new product features Collaborate with and review PRs of other team members Improve the reliability and robustness of our application Work on scalability and performance improvements Work together with our product and DevOps teams on requirements and issuesExcellent programming skills in Haskell or similar typed functional language Experience not necessarily professional building a practical program in Haskell Experience with web development, web technologies and APIs Familiarity with SQL and relational databases, preferably Postgres Good working knowledge of Linux, git, and the commandline Committed to high engineering standards Living in The Netherlands or willing to relocate and in possession of a work permit if youre a nonEU citizenNice to haveKnowledge of Haskell libraries like warp, conduit, async, servant, aeson, compact Familiar with Python or other dynamic languages Experience in tuning and scaling a big application Having worked with distributed systems before Interested in automation and fast buildsWhat do we offerChallenging fulltime function with space for personal initiative An interesting job within a talented team, with fastestgrowing software companies in the world Our cloud communications platform makes it possible for businesses to instantly connect with over 7 billion phones globally, allowing them to speak with their customers in the same ways they talk to their friendsOur suite provides access to all major messaging channels, from SMS and Voice to WeChat, Messenger, Facebook, WhatsApp and more We provide outofthebox solutions with our own applications like Inbox and Flow Builder, plus a robust set of APIs that simplify workflows and automationWith over 20,000 customers  including some of the worlds biggest brands like Facebook, Deliveroo, Uber and WhatsApp  its likely that youve benefited from MessageBirds omnichannel technology at some point For small and midsized businesses, we also offer support and solutions through an Online SelfServe OSS dashboardOur global team is a powerhouse of 350 employees, who work across eight international offices Were excited that youre here and interested to We work fast, grow fast, and build fast Life at MessageBird moves in fastforward motion Were a team that focuses on making an impact  right from day one We are gogetters, industry leaders, and dreamers Risk takers Rollupyoursleevesandmakeithappen kind of people We thrive on transparency, and we value solutionminded attitudesWe are all driven by one ethos Get Shit Done We love shaping things together and leveraging different perspectives, because that makes our products better Our Birds are empowered with freedom and opportunity in return, we expect honesty, courage, and agility We own our work, and sometimes we fail And then we get back up and cross the finish line  together as a team Sound refreshing We think so, tooSoftware Engineers play a big role in our RTC engineering squads place and receive millions of voice calls per day, gain realtime insights using our Dashboard and create new and innovative voice flowsOur voice squads have the freedom and authority to create tijd, waarin de rol van techniek steeds belangrijker wordt, zijn wij een aanjager van nieuwe technologische ontwikkelingen We hebben de kennis, de ervaring en het vakmanschap om intelligente systemen en integrale, duurzame oplossingen te bedenken, te ontwikkelen, te implementeren, te beheren en te onderhouden Wij zijn verantwoordelijk voor de complete technische installaties in duizenden gebouwen, talloze schepen, vele industrile complexen, tunnels, bruggen, sluizen en tienduizenden andere projecten in allerlei marktsectoren Nationaal en internationaal Met onze diensten dragen we bij aan het goed en kostenefficint functioneren van organisaties, gebouwen, schepen, infrastructurele en industrile installaties Wij onderscheiden ons door op elk niveau duurzaamheid door te voeren De dienstverlening van Croonwolterdros bestaat uit advies, integraal ontwerp, realisatie en beheer Turn key, in partnership of op projectbasis Bij elke opdracht streven we naar de hoogst haalbare normen voor de eindgebruiker op de gebieden veiligheid, comfort, communicatie en energiemanagement Functionele behoeften van de eindgebruiker en kosteneffectiviteit staan centraalNaast een plezierige werksfeer, bieden wij jou een aantrekkelijk salaris en uitstekende secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden Maar Croonwolterdros beloont niet alleen in geld Wij vinden het belangrijk dat jij alle mogelijkheid krijgt om binnen de organisatie te werken aan jouw persoonlijke en professionele ontwikkeling De techniek staat immers ook geen dag stil Hiervoor hebben we een eigen portal met een aanbod van meer dan BedrijfsomschrijvingOnder de rook van Rotterdam werk je met zon 50 collegas aan projecten voor klanten die bij een groot publiek bekend zijn Klanten die in de machinebouw en in de maritieme sector werkzaam zijn Kleine projecten pak je zelfstandig op, maar in grotere werk je samen met 2 tot 5 collegas vanuit een modern kantoorpand Hoogopgeleide mensen die zowel in de breedte als in de diepte kennis van zaken hebben De mentaliteit van de Maasstad komt je meteen al tegemoet zodra je uit Gouda, Delft, Den Haag of Zoetermeer aan komt rijdenSteeds efficinter werken vraagt om vergevorderde automatisering die niets aan het toeval overlaat Met name in de machinebouw en voor de offshore industrie groeit de vraag naar slimmere oplossingen in de vorm van hoogwaardige, geautomatiseerde systemen Met de door jou op maat geschreven software maak jij van deze systemen een onmisbare schakel in internationaal opererende miljoenenbedrijvenNeem bijvoorbeeld Boskalis, een van s werelds grootste baggermaatschappijen, een klant die regelmatig de hulp inroept van jouw expertise in de industrile automatisering Bijvoorbeeld bij het plaatsen van 80 meter hoge windturbines voor de Duitse kust Met een reusachtige Pilegripper, aangestuurd door een fraai stukje engineering, werd dit op een veilige en verantwoorde wijze uitgevoerd Of denk aan online winkels als Zalando en Amazon, die dankzij slimme engineeringstechnieken bestellingen sneller kunnen inpakken en verzenden Indrukwekkende projecten die jij als software engineer ontwikkelt en in werking zetRecht voor zn raap en geen blad voor de mond De bekende Rotterdamse mentaliteit zit namelijk ook in jouw bloed Misschien is die niet altijd direct zichtbaar, maar als het moet zeg jij waar het op staat In deze functie zijn de tripjes naar het buitenland voor jou de krenten in de pap Dankzij een overzichtelijke planning die ver van te voren bekend is, kost het je geen moeite om een paar weken in het buitenland te werken Dat hoort nu eenmaal ook bij het beroep van een software engineer zoals jijVoor een ervaren software engineer die al de nodige stappen binnen de industrile automatisering heeft gezet, kun je hier cht verder komen met je carrire Zo kun je van binnenuit doorgroeien tot leadengineer of projectleider en daar eigenhandig sturing geven om tot een prachtig eindresultaat te komen Persoonlijke en professionele groei zit dus zo ongeveer bij deze functie inbegrepen, mede doordat je werk niet blijft steken bij slechts een type besturingssysteem Jij komt alles tegen Daarom krijg je van ons
